item.name: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]WWE RAW[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] REPLAYS[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: dir
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'https://thechains24.com/GREENHAT/WWE%20Monday%20Night%20Raw.xml'): from resources.lib.modules import control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return from resources.lib.indexers import lists lists.indexer().get(url)

[COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]ROYAL RUMBLE LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (BIZ)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return url = client.schedule('https://crackstreams.biz/boxingstreams/') return url

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param1]') return url

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]WWE LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (FREEFEDS)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = page_data.split('WWE schedule',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('

MLB schedule

',1)[0] s = re.findall('

([^<]*)|box">([^<]*)|(?s)URL.*?ue="([^"]*)', page_data) return s

regex.name: makelist2

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]WWE LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (AM)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)\'clearfix\'.*?<a href="([^"]*).*?ing\'>([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param1]') return url

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]WWE LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (TST)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('post-title">\s*<a href="([^"]*).*?="([^"]*)',page_data) return r
